required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: BI 860585 Dose Escalation Single Agent and in Combination With Exemestane or With Paclitaxel in Patients With Various Advanced and/or Metastatic Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: An Open Label Phase I Dose Finding Study of BI 860585 Administered Orally in a Continuous Dosing Schedule as Single Agent and in Combination With Exemestane or With Paclitaxel in Patients With Various Advanced and/or Metastatic Solid Tumours

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the trial is to determine the maximum tolerated doses (MTD) of BI 860585 alone and in combination with exemestane or paclitaxel. To determine the MTDs, patients are entered sequentially into escalating dose cohorts. Secondary objectives are objective response and disease control according to RECIST criteria version 1.1

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum tolerated dose in each treatment arm (based on number of dose limiting toxicities (DLTs) in first course of each treatment arm.
Number of DLTs in first course of each treatment arm.

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-infinity of BI 860585 administered as single agent and with combination agents.
t1/2(ss) of BI 860585 administered as single agent and with combination agents.
tmax(ss) of BI 860585 administered as single agent and with combination agents.
Objective response rate (complete response/CR, partial response/PR per RECIST criteria version 1.1).
Disease control rate/clinical benefit rate (complete response/CR, partial response/PR, stable disease/SD per RECIST criteria version 1.1).
Duration of objective response (CR/PR), defined as time from first objective response to the time to progression or death.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: time from first objective response to the time to progression or death, assessed up to 4 months

secondary_outcome.measure: Duration of clinical benefit (CR/PR/SD), defined as time from first clinical benefit to progression or death.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: time from first clinical benefit to progression or death, assessed up to 4 months

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-24(ss) of BI 860585 administered as single agent and with combination agents.
Cmax(ss) of BI 860585 administered as single agent and with combination agents.

arm_group.description: Multiple ascending doses of BI 860585 administered continuously in a 28-day cycle, including food interaction cohorts
Multiple ascending doses of BI 860585 in combination with fixed dose paclitaxel
Multiple ascending doses of BI 860585 in combination with fixed dose exemestane

intervention.description: BI 860585 multiple dose escalation, once daily
BI 860585 multiple dose escalation, once daily
BI 860585 multiple dose escalation, once daily
